scripts.title: FiveM Vehicle Breakdown Script
scripts.description: Dynamic and realistic vehicle failure script based on driven mileage, simulating real wear and tear. Highly configurable, compatible with ESX and QBCore.

installation.content: Clone or download the repository into your FiveM server resources directory.
Place the script files into your server resources directory.
Add the following line to your server.cfg file:
Configure the database. Use the following SQL to create the vehicle_kilometers table:

content: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vehicle_kilometers (
plate VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,

installation.content: Edit the config.lua file according to your needs and restart the server.

configuration.content: The script is highly configurable. Edit config.lua to customize:

scripts.usage: Vehicle failures are triggered automatically based on driven kilometers. The system simulates real wear and different types of breakdowns depending on the configuration.
features: Engine failure: Completely shuts down the vehicle engine
Tire blowout: Randomly bursts a tire
Power loss: Significantly reduces engine power
Fuel leak: Causes a fuel leak
Transmission failure: Temporarily disables the transmission
Battery drain: Completely drains the vehicle battery
Brake failure: Activates brakes and handbrake
Transmission fluid leak: Reduces transmission health
Clogged fuel filter: Decreases fuel level
Door detachment: Randomly causes a door to fall off
requirements: ESX Framework or QBCore Framework for FiveM
SQL database to store mileage data

scripts.title: Muhaddil Bed Configurator
scripts.description: A simple FiveM script to generate and configure NPC positions for bed animations, ideal for ambulance scripts.

installation.content: Add the resource folder to your server's 'resources' directory.
Add the following line to your server.cfg:
(Optional) Add ACE permissions in your server.cfg:
add_ace group.admin bedconfigurator allow # allow all commands
Use one of the available in-game commands to start configuring positions.

configuration.content: The configurator automatically generates coordinates. Use in-game commands to position NPCs and export the configuration.

scripts.usage: Use the available commands to configure bed positions, pagers, and more. The NPC will automatically follow your camera and you can adjust position, rotation, and height in real time.
features: Generates configurable NPCs near the player
Rotation with left/right arrows or mouse wheel

controls: Camera tracking: NPC follows where you look
Rotate: Left/Right arrows or Mouse Wheel
